targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "HARDWARE" WHERE "device"::tag=~ /^$rtr$/ AND $timeFilter group by VERSION, MODEL, device
SELECT count("exception") FROM "ALARMING" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/) and time > now()-15m  group by "ALARM_TYPE" fill(0)
SELECT "linecard_cpu" FROM "HARDWARE" WHERE "device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "component_name" =~ /FPC.*/ AND $timeFilter group by component_name
SELECT 100 - "idle_cpu" FROM "HARDWARE" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "component_name" =~ /Routing Engine0|RE0/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "buffer_usage" FROM "HARDWARE" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "component_name" =~ /Routing Engine0|RE0/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "linecard_memory" FROM "HARDWARE" WHERE "device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "component_name" =~ /FPC.*/ AND $timeFilter group by component_name
SELECT * FROM "LOGS" WHERE ("device"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/) AND $timeFilter and path='/junos/events/event'
SELECT 100-"idle_cpu" FROM "HARDWARE" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/) AND $timeFilter group by component_name
SELECT "buffer_usage" FROM "HARDWARE" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/) AND $timeFilter and component_name=~/.*outing.*|RE.*/ GROUP BY "component_name"
SELECT "linecard_cpu" FROM "HARDWARE" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/) AND component_name=~ /^FPC.*/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY component_name
SELECT "linecard_memory" FROM "HARDWARE" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/) AND $timeFilter AND component_name=~ /^FPC.*/ GROUP BY "component_name"
SELECT "cpu_utilization" FROM "PROCESS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/) and $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "process_pid"
SELECT "cpu_utilization" FROM "PROCESS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/) AND "cpu_utilization"!=0 and $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "process_pid"
SELECT "memory_usage" FROM "PROCESS" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/) AND "memory_usage">30000000 and $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "process_pid" fill(0)

list.definition: show tag values from HARDWARE with key="device"
list.label: Router
list.name: rtr
list.query: show tag values from HARDWARE with key="device"

title: VMX ROUTER HEALTH MONITORING PROFILE - JTSO
